thread.section_title: PureFormulas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PureFormulas | www.pureformulas.com
thread.title: Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text: PureFormulas has an unusual return policy that leads me to never buy from them again. I thought I could return the Vegan Evening Primrose Oil that gave me unrelenting heartburn for 3 miserable days, but they refused to because the bottle was opened. A far cry from the Vitamin Shoppe, who accepts returns regardless and who are compassionate to those people like me, who suffer from food and you name it, sensitivities. Make sure if you buy from PureFormulas that you do NOT need to return the product.
